content.en: Defect detection revolution: Researchers have proposed various algorithms to improve the detection of defects in transmission line insulators. These algorithms, such as CenterNet, Faster R-CNN, YOLOv7, and YOLOv5, utilize deep learning methods to accurately identify and classify defects in high-resolution aerial images. By enhancing the efficiency and accuracy of defect detection, these algorithms contribute to the development of intelligent systems for maintaining the power grid's reliability.
content.da: Defektdetektionsrevolution: Forskere har foreslået forskellige algoritmer for at forbedre detektionen af defekter i transmissionsledningsisolatorer. Disse algoritmer, såsom CenterNet, Faster R-CNN, YOLOv7 og YOLOv5, anvender dyb læringsmetoder til præcist at identificere og klassificere defekter i højopløselige luftbilleder. Ved at forbedre effektiviteten og nøjagtigheden af defektdetektion bidrager disse algoritmer til udviklingen af intelligente systemer til at opretholde pålideligheden af elnettet.
